extendedInfo.description: Over 300+ unique points of interest (POIs) throughout Yellowstone National Park. A 60+ minute audio/auto tour, GPS-enabled/custom-made mapÂ which works WITHOUT a cell/wifi connection, daily Ranger-Led events schedule, sunrise/sunsets data for over a year, photo gallery, 30+ hiking trail descriptions, a special Safety section, and details on museums, restrooms, picnicking, and bicycling. RICH CONTENT: + Content has been written by a professional travel writer.+ Over 100 photographs of park.+ Descriptions for 30 of the most popular hiking trails with the park. + Unique Safety section which details all the concerns while visiting the park. + Location and description of EVERY restroom in the park! + Location and description of EVERY parking lot in the park! + Location and description of EVERY picnic area lot in the park! + Details on bicycling, camping, lighthouses, museums, swimming, birding and boat launches throughout the park!MAPS: + NO CELL/WIFI CONNECTION REQUIRED! Download all the maps for offline usage.+ High resolution, topographic maps which you can edit!+ Carriage roads intersection labels.+ Hiking trails for the entire park.+ Interactive map annotations.Â  + GPS "where am I" function for the entire Park (does not work on non-GPS enabled devices such as the iPod Touch) Â  AUDIO/AUTO TOUR: + 60 minute audio tour by a professional voiceover artist.Â  + 50+ points of interest located in throughout The Grand Loop including points between the North Entrance, South Entrance, Northeast Entrance, East Entrance and West Entrance.RANGER-LED EVENTS SCHEDULE: + Daily National Park Service Ranger-led events are pre-loaded and updated automatically.+ Includes the time, optional fees, accessibility, meeting location, and description. + View multiple days of events.+ Updated on a regular basis.SUNRISE/SUNSET: + Sunrise and sunset data for two best locations in the park for wildlife viewing and sunrise/sunset viewing. Great for photographers!+ View any date within 365 days into the future + Updated on a regular basis INTERFACE: + Universal National Park Service symbols. + Search all content within the app.+ Favorites feature.PUSH NOTIFICATIONS: + Push notifications for park-related news, alerts, and events.+ Push notifications as soon as they are available.For more details on this and other Chimani apps for the national parks, visit www.chimani.com. Be sure to follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/chimani and Facebook at www.facebook.com/chimaniAndroid Permissions Request ExplanationFor human readable explanations on why this Chimani app is requesting various permissions on your device, please refer to our privacy policy at http://www.chimani.com/privacy.html.

reviews.title: Good stuff free!
reviews.comment: This is an amazing app that not only gives you interesting background information but also gives you real time updates and park service announcements. I love it.
reviews.author: Leonard Landis

reviews.title: Great for our visit to Yellowstone
reviews.comment: This app a had a lot of useful info as we made our way through the park. It also has a good break down of the areas or the different categories you can choose from to find what you are looking for or what is in the area you are in. The best part is that once downloaded you don\'t have to usr internet to keep this app working which is good due to the spotty cell phone coverage in the park and mountains and such.
reviews.author: Ashley Davis

reviews.title: Was looking forward to using this app.
reviews.comment: After trying repeatedly to download the maps for offline use I\'m pretty much ready to uninstall this app. My understanding is that cell/data coverage is sparse to non-existent in Yellowstone, so I wanted the maps for my upcoming trip. Unfortunately I\'m not even sure how large the map files even are, I\'m only guessing that the number given is in kb, making it about 80MB, no big deal. I finally decided to try downloading via 4G, figuring that\'s faster than the wi-fi at home. It was moving any faster, so I gave up. The app used nearly 50MB of data, yet when I check the app settings, the app is only about 20MB, and the data files are less than 3MB. What was is downloading if it wasn\'t the map files?  Absolutely worthless to me at this point, and I had such high hopes for it. Figured I would keep trying to download the maps since I have some time before my trip. It downloaded all night, and several hours into the day, and it keeps the screen on, but don\'t dare turn it off or the download stops. It finally got to 59%. The network connection was lost, which meant that I had to go back in and try to download again. Where does it resume? 18%. Seriously, what\'s with that.
reviews.author: Craig Pifer

reviews.title: Update?
reviews.comment: When are you going to update the info for this summer. Old Faithful area is opening up. Two of the three hotels are open now but the information on this ap is not. Looks like a good concept but it is only a shell of a program. Sorry but it is an uninstall.
reviews.author: Steele Clark

reviews.title: The things I never knew ...
reviews.comment: This app is really cool, especially if you can hook the phone up to your car\'s audio system. It really added to our trip through Yellowstone, and will help with planning our next tour. The map got a little buggy from time to time - but my only real problem was that I kept draining my battery exploring this app and forgot my car charger!
reviews.author: Sammich Snickelbritches

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I really like this app.  The developer is responsive and very helpful.  Looking forward to using this app in Yellowstone.  I will follow up after my trip with more details.
reviews.author: Rob Poirier

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes when trying to read a notification. Gs3 and gs4 phones. Terrible map zoom levels.
reviews.author: Jarrett Volzer

reviews.title: Good idea poorly developed
reviews.comment: I waited with my screen on for 2 hours for the maps to download and it was only at 48%.( my internet is 20mbps) The app lags on my nexus 10 and my nexus 4.
reviews.author: Justin Volzer

reviews.comment: Very easy to use. Lots of info
reviews.author: Janice Hutyra

reviews.title: Unable tp download offline map; Developer did not respond
reviews.comment: Great idea, free app, but what can it do in the park where there is no wireless coverage and takes forever and almost impossible to download offline material?
reviews.author: HW Y

reviews.title: Top notch program
reviews.comment: I have this program for several parks I visit and would not go with out it.
reviews.author: Dennis O\'Donnell

reviews.comment: Great for panning trips!
reviews.author: Jesus Lizarraga

reviews.title: Great potential but maps cache is unacceptable
reviews.comment: Lots of great information about Yellowstone park. The map can get quite detailed with contours and topo. The map allows you to filter what types of points you want to see (I turned off fishing, picnic areas, bicycling). There are a lot of geysers and other features listed, and you can click on them for more information and pictures. You can set them as favorites so you can find them again. It also lists trails, with descriptions.  The biggest problem, especially with Yellowstone, is the park is HUGE, the size of the state of Delaware. So there are 80,000 map tiles to store, covering all 7 different resolutions, down to being quite detailed. And it takes a *long* time for those to download. Worse, there is a function to download all of the maps, but it might only get 100 at a time before timing out (set your device not to sleep; you can get 1% in 30 minutes). After 3 days of playing around with it and trying numerous times to get everything, including scanning around at different zoom levels, I got up to 7% map coverage (covering most of the road). Then something happened and all the maps were lost. Sometimes only part was lost. 2 GB of data transfer over a week, all gone. Useless.
reviews.author: Ted Cashin

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Full of everything you nerd for a great trip.
reviews.author: Larry Ormand

reviews.title: Freezes way too much
reviews.comment: It froze on me 3 times in 10 minutes.  Content is slow and app is sluggish.  I love the concept though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a good app
reviews.comment: This crashes more than it runs. Says it needs an air mail app but when I try to download it can\'t be found. Its free and not even worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.comment: I\'m in a wheelchair so the driving tour part of the app is a huge help. We just left Yellowstone and I used this app a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Maps crash. Locations not all correct.
reviews.comment: Boiling River mapped in totally wrong place. Wasted an hour of driving. Maps crashed when zooming. Best used as a supplemental map. Not your only information.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yellowstone np
reviews.comment: Looks good so far, but can\'t find AP for the updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Be prepared
reviews.comment: This app can be useful but be sure that all the offline maps are downloaded before heading for Wyoming. Data connectivity in the park is almost non existent. The maps are not great but the info. Presented in the app is helpful. Worth it, but just barely
reviews.author: A Google User
